comments:
Build I2004131323.

I'm editing a really simple Ant file Javadoc.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<project default="javadoc">
    <target name="javadoc">
        <javadoc destdir="D:\usr\OTI\Javadoc" access="public" use="false" 
notree="true" nonavbar="true" noindex="true" splitindex="false" author="false" 
version="false" nodeprecatedlist="false" nodeprecated="false" 
sourcefiles="X.java" sourcepath="b51911" classpath="b51911"/>
    </target>
</project>

I want to replace sourcepath and classpath value.

First problem: I double-click on one of 'b51911' (let say sourcepath one) and 
didn't get the text selected although it should be.

Second problem: I select manually the text 'b51911' and replace it by '.',
then I get following NPE:
